key.name: custom-colors
key.description: An array of custom colors to show in the color chooser. Each color is specified as a tuple of four doubles, specifying RGBA values between 0 and 1.

key.name: selected-color
key.description: The selected color, described as a tuple whose first member is a boolean that is true if a color was selected, and the remaining four members are four doubles, specifying RGBA values between 0 and 1.
